author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: Checks the reputation of the given IP address.
commands.name: ip

commands.description: Checks the reputation of the given domain name.
commands.name: domain

commands.description: Checks the reputation of the given hash of the file.
commands.name: file

commands.description: Checks the reputation of the given email address.
commands.name: threatstream-email-reputation

commands.description: Returns enrichment data for Domain or IP for available observables.
commands.name: threatstream-get-passive-dns

commands.description: Imports indicators (observables) into ThreatStream. The imported data must be approved using the ThreatStream UI. The data can be imported using one of three methods: plain-text, file, or URL.
commands.name: threatstream-import-indicator-with-approval

commands.description: Imports indicators (observables) into ThreatStream. Approval is not required for the imported data. You must have the Approve Intel user permission to import without approval using the API.
commands.name: threatstream-import-indicator-without-approval

commands.description: Returns a list of threat models.
commands.name: threatstream-get-model-list

commands.description: Returns an HTML file with a description of the threat model.
commands.name: threatstream-get-model-description

commands.description: Returns a list of indicators associated with the specified model and ID of the model.
commands.name: threatstream-get-indicators-by-model

commands.description: Submits a file or URL to the ThreatStream-hosted sandbox for detonation.
commands.name: threatstream-submit-to-sandbox

commands.description: Returns the current status of the report submitted to the sandbox. The report ID is returned from the threatstream-submit-to-sandbox command.
commands.name: threatstream-get-analysis-status

commands.description: Returns the report of a file or URL submitted to the sandbox.
commands.name: threatstream-analysis-report

commands.description: Return filtered indicators from ThreatStream. If a query is defined, it overrides all other arguments that were passed to the command.
commands.name: threatstream-get-indicators

commands.description: Adds tags to intelligence to filter for related entities.
commands.name: threatstream-add-tag-to-model

commands.description: Creates a threat model with the specified parameters.
commands.name: threatstream-create-model

commands.description: Updates a threat model with specific parameters. If one or more optional parameters are defined, the command overrides previous data stored in ThreatStream.
commands.name: threatstream-update-model

commands.description: Returns a list of supported platforms for default or premium sandbox.
commands.name: threatstream-supported-platforms

commands.description: Checks the reputation of the given URL.
commands.name: url

integration.description: Use Anomali ThreatStream to query and submit threats.
integration.name: Anomali ThreatStream v3

commands.name: threatstream-email-reputation

commands.description: Returns enrichment data for Domain or IP for available observables.
commands.name: threatstream-get-passive-dns

commands.description: Imports indicators (observables) into ThreatStream. Approval of the imported data is required, using the ThreatStream UI. The data can be imported using one of three methods: plain-text, file, or URL. Only one argument can be used.
commands.name: threatstream-import-indicator-with-approval

commands.description: Imports indicators (observables) into ThreatStream. Approval is not required for the imported data. You must have the Approve Intel user permission to import without approval using the API.
commands.name: threatstream-import-indicator-without-approval

commands.description: Returns a list of threat models.
commands.name: threatstream-get-model-list

commands.description: Returns an HTML file with a description of the threat model.
commands.name: threatstream-get-model-description

commands.description: Returns a list of indicators associated with the specified model and ID of the model.
commands.name: threatstream-get-indicators-by-model

commands.description: Submits a file or URL to the ThreatStream-hosted Sandbox for detonation.
commands.name: threatstream-submit-to-sandbox

commands.description: Returns the current status of the report that was submitted to the sandbox. The report ID is returned from the threatstream-submit-to-sandbox command.
commands.name: threatstream-get-analysis-status

commands.description: Returns the report of a file or URL that was submitted to the sandbox.
commands.name: threatstream-analysis-report

commands.description: Return filtered indicators from ThreatStream. If a query is defined, it overrides all other arguments that were passed to the command.
commands.name: threatstream-get-indicators

commands.description: Adds tags to intelligence for purposes of filtering for related entities.
commands.name: threatstream-add-tag-to-model

commands.description: Creates a threat model with the specified parameters.
commands.name: threatstream-create-model

commands.description: Updates a threat model with specific parameters. If one or more optional parameters are defined, the command overrides previous data stored in ThreatStream.
commands.name: threatstream-update-model

commands.description: Returns a list of supported platforms for default or premium sandbox.
commands.name: threatstream-supported-platforms

playbook.description: Detonate one or more files using the Anomali ThreatStream v2 integration. This playbook returns relevant reports to the War Room, and file reputations to the context data.
playbook.name: Detonate File - ThreatStream

playbook.description:
Detonates one or more URLs using the Anomali ThreatStream v2 sandbox integration.
Returns relevant reports to the War Room and URL reputations to the context data.
playbook.name: Detonate URL - ThreatStream
